body_html:
This is most likely due to differences between the CPU and GPU OpKernels for the embedding lookup, and your code doesn't constrain where the variables are placed, so they are possibly on CPU in one case and on GPU in the other.

You could validate this by adding log_device_placement=True to your session ConfigProto, or explicitly constrain the device placement of the variables.

You could validate this by adding log_device_placement=True to your session ConfigProto, or explicitly constrain the device placement of the variables.
body:
This is most likely due to differences between the CPU and GPU OpKernels for the embedding lookup, and your code doesn't constrain where the variables are placed, so they are possibly on CPU in one case and on GPU in the other.

You could validate this by adding `log_device_placement=True` to your session ConfigProto, or explicitly constrain the device placement of the variables.
